    • Field Detail

      • verticalAlign

        public java.lang.String verticalAlign
        The vertical alignment of the buttons. Can be one of "top", "middle" or "bottom".

        Try it:

         •  Buttons at lower right

        accepted values:

         ["top", "middle", "bottom"]

        default:

         top

      • symbolFill

        public HIColor symbolFill
        Fill color for the symbol within the button.

        Try it:

         •  Blue symbol stroke for one of the buttons

        default:

         #666666

      • text

        public java.lang.String text
        A text string to add to the individual button.

        Try it:

         •  Full text button
         •  Combined symbol and text

        default:

         null

      • align

        public java.lang.String align
        Alignment for the buttons.

        Try it:

         •  Center aligned

        accepted values:

         ["left", "center", "right"]

        default:

         right

      • enabled

        public java.lang.Boolean enabled
        Whether to enable buttons.

        Try it:

         •  Exporting module loaded but buttons disabled

        default:

         true

      • theme

        public HITheme theme
        A configuration object for the button theme. The object accepts SVG properties like stroke-width, stroke and fill. Tri-state button styles are supported by the states.hover and states.select objects.

        Try it:

         •  Theming the buttons

      • height

        public java.lang.Number height
        Pixel height of the buttons.

        Try it:

         •  Bigger buttons

        default:

         22

      • width

        public java.lang.Number width
        The pixel width of the button.

        Try it:

         •  Bigger buttons

        default:

         24

      • buttonSpacing

        public java.lang.Number buttonSpacing
        The pixel spacing between buttons.

        default:

         3

      • symbolSize

        public java.lang.Number symbolSize
        The pixel size of the symbol on the button.

        Try it:

         •  Bigger buttons

        default:

         14

      • y

        public java.lang.Number y
        The vertical offset of the button's position relative to its verticalAlign.

        Try it:

         •  Buttons at lower right

        default:

         0

      • symbolStroke

        public HIColor symbolStroke
        The color of the symbol's stroke or line.

        Try it:

         •  Blue symbol stroke

        default:

         #666666

      • symbolY

        public java.lang.Number symbolY
        The y position of the center of the symbol inside the button.

        Try it:

         •  Bigger buttons

        default:

         10.5

      • symbolX

        public java.lang.Number symbolX
        The x position of the center of the symbol inside the button.

        Try it:

         •  Bigger buttons

        default:

         12.5

      • symbolStrokeWidth

        public java.lang.Number symbolStrokeWidth
        The pixel stroke width of the symbol on the button.

        Try it:

         •  Bigger buttons

        default:

         1
